title: doc2data - Document-to-Data Pipeline
description: Developed a production-ready PDF/Image-to-JSON pipeline with layout segmentation, OCR, semantic labeling stubs, and a Streamlit control panel. Architecture is CPU-friendly today, GPU-ready by design, and exposes FastAPI endpoints for downstream system integration.
context: Production AI Pipeline | OCR + Layout Intelligence

title: MARCH-PAWS Offline RAG Assistant (Medical)
description: Designed a fully offline medical RAG assistant that reads TCCC-style manuals and returns grounded, step-by-step MARCH-PAWS checklists. Implemented a finite-state orchestrator with BM25 + FAISS hybrid retrieval, Reciprocal Rank Fusion, cross-encoder reranking, and async/threaded inference on local Mistral-7B.

title: MIMIC-CXR Radiology Report Generation
description: Fine-tuned LLaVA-NeXT v1.6 (Mistral-7B) with LoRA on A100 to generate structured JSON radiology reports from chest X-rays, with optional EHR conditioning. Added curriculum learning, JSON-first multi-pass prompting, and A/B evaluation (image-only vs image+EHR) to improve report quality and clinical reasoning.

title: Emotion-Aware NPCs (Real-time CV for Games)
description: Built a webcam-based affect understanding system that adapts Unity NPC dialogue in real time. Combined facial emotion recognition with valence-arousal mapping, temporal smoothing (EMA + spike detection), and multi-signal fusion (FER + eye aspect ratio + head pose + optical flow) behind a FastAPI service.

title: RadStream - Cloud-Native Medical Imaging Pipeline
description: Designed an AWS-first medical imaging architecture for low-latency ingestion and scalable inference using serverless orchestration and EKS/Triton serving. Streamed telemetry into a data lake stack (S3/Glue/Athena/QuickSight) with security controls (IAM/WAF/GuardDuty) for observable, secure clinical workflows.

title: SkillSpring - AI-Powered Career Guidance System
description: Built a full-stack AI learning and career platform with FastAPI, Groq LLM integration, Cohere embeddings, and Supabase. Includes PDF intelligence, AI-generated summaries/quizzes/flashcards/micro-lessons, skill-gap analysis, roadmap generation, and production deployment via Railway + Vercel.

title: Multimodal Fashion Recommendation Engine
description: Fine-tuned CLIP vision/text encoders with BLIP-generated captions and segmentation masks for stronger text-image alignment. Integrated adaptive query reweighting and FAISS retrieval, achieving 88% Mean Opinion Score against human relevance judgments.

title: End-to-End Stock Forecasting - Tesla (TSLA)
description: Built a modular forecasting stack combining technical indicators, FinBERT sentiment, and ensemble models (RF/XGBoost/LSTM-GRU) with Optuna tuning and walk-forward validation. Achieved <2% MAPE in controlled backtesting workflows.

title: Legal Case Summarisation Pipeline
description: Scraped and summarized 250k+ Dutch legal rulings with robust chunking, batch orchestration, retry logic, and evaluation-ready outputs. Built scalable CLI tooling for legal analytics and civic-tech workflows.

title: Fake News Detection - IIT (BHU) Summer Intern
description: Designed a fake-news classifier using manually labeled social data and fact-checking workflows. Combined Word2Vec/GloVe representations with Random Forest + LSTM models to reach 94% recall and improve trust in content triaging pipelines.
context: Summer intern project at IIT (BHU) Varanasi
